definition: "dot" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 3)/see also 點|点[dian3]
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing mountain/☶/ancient Chinese compass point: 45° (northeast)
positive (in its effect)/leading to good consequences/virtuous/(medicine) benign (tumor etc)
innate sense of right and wrong/conscience/bosom friend
Zhang Xueliang (1901-2001) son of Fengtian clique warlord, then senior general for the Nationalists and subsequently for the People's Liberation Army
Hui Liangyu (1944-) PRC Hui national career politician from Guilin, background in economics, politburo member 2002-2012, deputy chair of State Council 2003-2013

sentences.english: ADC values and FA values may be predictive of astrocytic tumor classification.
sentences.chinese: FA值在腫瘤良惡性鑑別中有一定的價值。

sentences.english: A good seaman is known in bad weather.
At the end of the meeting, Luo Tiangang immediately found Zhong Liang.
sentences.chinese: 會議結束，羅天剛立刻找到鍾良。

sentences.english: Media can play role ensuring good governance and accountability.
sentences.chinese: 媒體可發揮制衡作用，確保良政治理和問責性。

sentences.english: Hear the report of Liang Liang Zhao Guibo mused.
sentences.chinese: 聽到鍾良的彙報趙貴波沉思不語。

sentences.english: Good: the symptoms alleviated, and patients could insist on working.
sentences.chinese: 良爲症狀基本消失，能作輕工作或堅持工作。

sentences.english: Following the War, these techniques were adapted to the civilian market.
sentences.chinese: 戰後，這些技術經改良，用於了民用市場。

sentences.english: The case demonstrates the value of FDG-PET scan in differentiating benign from malignancy in surveying ovarian lesions.
sentences.chinese: 此例亦說明正子攝影於區分卵巢病竈良惡性之價值。

sentences.english: In addition to Beijing, Markarian and his entourage will also visit Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 除北京外，馬爾加良總理及其代表團將訪問上海。

sentences.english: Objective To research the differentiation diagnostic method of the begin or malignant ascites.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討良惡性腹水的鑑別診斷方法。

sentences.english: Construction show reinforcement treatment can acquire stable foundation strength and good ground endurance.
sentences.chinese: 實施效果表明，地基強度穩定，地耐力良。

sentences.english: Proficient represents solid academic performance, while basic shows partial mastery of skills.
sentences.chinese: 良代表紮實的學術能力，而及格表示掌握部分知識。

sentences.english: It is a 2 components polymer modified waterproofing coating that fills and seals pores and voids.
sentences.chinese: 它有兩種經改良的防水混合物能填補洞孔和空隙。

sentences.english: Wire-bonding is one of the critical processes that determine the quality of IC packaging.
sentences.chinese: 積體電路封裝品質的良窳，焊線是一關鍵製程。

sentences.english: Does the person have the branch with malign fine in the lipoma of body body length?
sentences.chinese: 人在身體長的脂肪瘤有沒有良惡性之分？

sentences.english: Objective To compare the changes of hemorheology and blood concretion status in patients with benign and malignant tumors.
sentences.chinese: 目的比較良惡性腫瘤患者的血液流變學及血凝的變化。

definition: to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
